PHRASE.LANG: Fluffy Flower Earmuffs - Light Blue (For Female)
Cache-oreilles à fleurs en fourrure - Bleu clair (pour femme)
Orejeras mullidas de flores: azul claro (para mujer)
Fluffy Flower Earmuffs - Light Blue (For Female)
Earmuffs patterned after a light blue flower.\nThe fluffy material is warm, and the big flower shape is very cute!\nPerfect for upgrading your winter wardrobe. [#Legal]
Cache-oreilles à motif de fleurs bleu clair.\nSa fourrure tient chaud et la grosse fleur est à croquer !\nIdéal pour améliorer votre garde-robe d'hiver. [#Legal]
Ohrenschützer mit hellblauem Blumenmuster.\nDas flauschige Material wärmt und die große Blume wirkt sehr hübsch!\nDamit lässt sich die Wintergarderobe toll aufpeppen. [#Legal]
Paraorecchie con motivo floreale sui toni dell'azzurro.\nIl materiale è morbido e caldo, e il motivo a fiori davvero carino!\nPerfetti per completare il guardaroba invernale. [#Legal]
Orejeras estampadas con flores de color azul claro.\n¡Están hechas de material cálido y su forma de gran flor es muy bonita!\nSon perfectas para poner a punto el armario de invierno. [#Legal]
Earmuffs patterned after a light blue flower.\nThe fluffy material is warm, and the big flower shape is very cute!\nPerfect for upgrading your winter wardrobe. [#Legal]
